title: Patriots89
author: Patriots89
content: Hey everyone,I have been betting sports for almost 20 years. I currently have what I believe to be an issue with two bets I made on the same match with stake.com. (Fifa match)I truly believe that stake.com and their odds provider sports radar have completely scammed me for almost $10,000 but I would like opinions of other players before I look to take this further.Please give me your honest opinion. I am not here to just hear what I want, I truly want to know what you would think in this situation and how it should be handled.Please keep in mind that I have bet thousands of e sports matches and I have never seen this happen before. I would also like to mention that stake.com‚Äôa customer support 100% dislikes me so they refuse to even assist in any form.Match was scheduled to start at 2:00am my time which means my bets were placed BEFORE the match.Here are the two bets placed at 1:57am and 1:59am respectively. Both FIRST HALF bets.https://ibb.co/VgsPBmBhttps://ibb.co/ncRFNfPIf you are on stake.com, here are the BET IDS.sport:110090760sport:110090969Here is proof of the score and live stream.Proof of score and live stream - as you can see, the first half was played, without issue and completed with a score of 2-1 for Alicia.https://ibb.co/BcBbVSqhttps://ibb.co/pQW5k5Fhttps://ibb.co/FBNs1hfHere is the OFFICIAL match video from the tournament.https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=4c0i8zyFBHkIf you watch the video, you will see that the girls randomly quit the game around the 70th minute when the score is 2-2Here are the sports rules for stake.com for fifa and e sportshttps://ibb.co/p1xvH57https://ibb.co/0JXqqXxhttps://ibb.co/FVSfwY9https://ibb.co/L6VXJngIn my opinion, if this was a real soccer match, the first half bets would have been settled regardless if the game finished or not.I think stake.com has slipped up here and this needs to get infront of the eyes of an experienced sports guy from stake.com.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: First of all, don't use offensive language when you are making a complaint. That won't get you anywhere. Second, this is an Esports game, I don't think they are giving away the winnings once the game is completely settled, unlike Live Sports. But, I do feel you here and I did read the answer of Stake.com with your complaints. They provided an answer and it's difficult to go against the Terms of Service just like what they emailed you. They have the right to void it especially if the game won't be completed. Maybe we should hear more about those who bet on Esports too if these kinds of bets do normally happen to them. Because if that was the case then you should just forget about it. Although I do believe that Stake.com should make it clear to you, the difference between Esports and Sports betting when it comes to betting per quarter or per half, so that this case could be closed. Try asking nicely.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: The problem on Stake ToS and probably most of sportbook was all the bets made on the specific game that is not finish due to certain reason is marked as cancelled/void since the bets will not be settled unless the game finish.This is both good and bad for those players that potentially lose or win their bet. Stake will¬† surely pay you if this is not stated on their ToS. In the eyes of observer, your bet is really a win but the rules of sportsbook will always govern no matter how unfair you think it is since you agree on it before you place your bet.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: I would say this belongs a little bit to scam accusations topic and not gambling discussions. The problem is that we should definitely be not ignoring the current situation and yet we are not really caring about it enough to make any deductions at this topic, I could say that OP is right, I could say that Stake is right and nothing would change here.However, if there is a topic about this at scam accusations, that would be a serious allegation and in that regard we are going to end up with seeing what the result will be and all the situation and responses will matter. This should be important because we are going to end up with a much better result eventually. Life is not that simple and we can't just assume some strangers online could help us, plus Stake is a 100+ million dollar company, and they would rather not have any accusations as well, so if there is actually something wrong, a proper topic would help OP get attention enough for a response.
